patthana3.12:1.1_0: Nokilesaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:2.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:4.1_0: Kilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:5.1_0: Nokilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:6.1_0: Kilesaṁ akusalañca nokilesaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:7.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:8.1_0: Kilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho,
patthana3.12:9.1_0: Nokilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
patthana3.12:10.1_0: Kilesaṁ akusalañca nokilesaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate
patthana3.12:10.1_1: khandhe ca vicikicchañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho,
patthana3.12:10.1_2: uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca uddhaccañca paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana3.12:12.1_0: Kileso akusalo dhammo kilesassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:14.1_0: Nokilesaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:15.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:17.1_0: Saṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:18.1_0: Asaṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:19.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana3.12:20.1_0: Saṅkilesikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:21.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:23.1_0: Saṅkilesikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:24.1_0: Asaṅkilesikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:25.1_0: Saṅkilesikaṁ abyākatañca asaṅkilesikaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:26.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana3.12:27.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:28.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:30.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:31.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:33.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:34.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:36.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:37.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:39.1_0: Kilesasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:40.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:42.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:43.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:45.1_0: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:46.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:48.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:49.1_0: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:50.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikaṁ akusalañca saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso
patthana3.12:50.1_1: ceva saṅkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:52.1_0: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:53.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.12:55.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:56.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:57.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ akusalañca saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso
patthana3.12:57.1_1: ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:58.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana3.12:59.1_0: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:60.1_0: Kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:61.1_0: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttaṁ akusalañca kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana3.12:61.1_1: kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:62.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana3.12:63.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:64.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ asaṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:65.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana3.12:66.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:67.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ asaṅkilesikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:68.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ abyākatañca kilesavippayuttaṁ asaṅkilesikaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana3.12:68.1_1: kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:69.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
